title: Calories in Chicken and Dumplings
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken and dumplings per serving, including macros like protein and carbs, plus basis details and variations for better meal planning.
assumptions: Homemade version with skinless chicken breast, flour-based dumplings, chicken broth, carrots, celery; 1 cup (about 250 g) serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, ingredients, portion size, and preparation method. Check labels or recipes for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One cup serving of chicken and dumplings provides ~280 kcal with balanced protein from chicken and carbs from dumplings.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use chicken thighs instead of breast per serving
Add 1 tbsp cream for creamy version per serving
Low-sodium broth and no added salt per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of chicken and dumplings?
faqs.a: About 280 kcal for a standard 1-cup homemade serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in chicken and dumplings?
faqs.a: Approximately 18 g protein per cup serving from the chicken.

faqs.q: Are chicken and dumplings high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 850 mg per serving due to broth; opt for low-sodium versions.

faqs.q: How do calories change with different recipes?
faqs.a: Creamy or fried dumplings can add 50+ kcal; leaner chicken reduces fat.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in chicken and dumplings?
faqs.a: Roughly 32 g carbs per serving, mostly from dumplings and veggies.
